title: A tea and cinnamon estate for sale
details:
3.5 acres are tea cultivation
2.0 acres are cinnamon cultivation
A month tea leaves around 2000-2200kg ( nowadays a kilogram of tea leaves Rs. 105/
Cinnamon income twice a year around Rs. 900000
Direct access to the estate
A lab our family is staying the estate. ( 6 people)
Very closed to yakkalamulla town.
17 km to pinnaduwa highway entrance.
Clear deeds.
Bank loan can be applied

NB:
This deal is handle by a real estate agent. No need brokers, please.
